abstract.shortdesc: (Old) The subjectRel element contains a set of subjects that are related in some manner. Each group of subjects is contained in a subjectRole element; the associations between different columns in the same row are evaluated in the same way as those in a relrow (from which subjectRel is specialized) but define relationships between the subjects instead of links between topic documents.

(New?) The subjectRel element specifies a row in a subject relationship table. Each row creates a relationship between the cells in that row, and so creates a relationship between the subjects that are contained in the cells.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The subjectRel element is specialized from relrow. It is defined in the subject scheme module.
